items.sentence: Tom wanted the whole world to know that he was in love with Mary.
Tom can't buy what he needs because he doesn't have enough money.
You know Tom and Mary don't get along with each other, don't you?
Have you been back to Australia since you graduated from college?
When was the last time you read a bedtime story to your children?
You ought to tell Tom that you aren't planning to stay very long.
This morning, Tom came to ask for my daughter's hand in marriage.
Many of my friends think Tom and Mary are overprotective parents.
She's thinking of taking a couple of courses at a cooking school.
It sort of looks like somebody used machine translation for this.
